item.title: 中国股市牛市不惧经济忧虑，泡沫风险与日俱增
item.description: 中国经济在关税和根深蒂固的房地产危机的重压下举步维艰，但股市却在延续牛市走势；这种脱节现象引发了人们对股市涨势持久力的怀疑。【原文：China’s economy is buckling under the weight of tariffs and a deep-rooted property crisis, yet stocks are extending their bull run — a disconnect that’s stirring doubts on the rally’s staying power.】

item.title: 热带风暴 "费尔南德 "不会对美国或加拿大构成威胁
item.description: 美国国家飓风中心周六表示，热带风暴费尔南在距离百慕大数百英里的大西洋公海上形成，预计将错过陆地。【原文：Tropical Storm Fernand formed in the open Atlantic Ocean hundreds of miles from Bermuda and is forecast to miss land, the US National Hurricane Center said on Saturday.】

item.title: 塞内加尔联盟敦促审计和取消未报告债务
item.description: 一个由立法者、经济学家和民间团体组成的联盟呼吁进行审计，以确定是否应取消以前未报告的 70 亿美元债务，理由是人们担心这些借款会对塞内加尔的财政造成压力。【原文：A coalition of lawmakers, economists and civil groups called for an audit to determine whether $7 billion in previously unreported debt should be canceled, citing concerns over the strain the borrowing places on Senegal’s finances.】

item.title: 鲍威尔转向就业市场，美国通胀将走高
item.description: 上个月，美国的一个关键通胀指标可能有所上升，这凸显了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔和他的同事们在平衡物价上涨和脆弱的就业市场中不断增加的风险方面所面临的挑战。【原文：A key US inflation gauge probably ticked higher last month, underscoring the challenge Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and his colleagues face in balancing rising prices and mounting risks in a fragile job market.】

item.title: 美联储杰克逊霍尔年会的重要启示
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔举办的年度经济研讨会已接近尾声。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City’s annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyoming is winding down.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利称英国面临提高潜在增长率的挑战
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，只要劳动力参与率仍然疲软，英国就面临着提高基本经济增长率的 "严峻挑战"。【原文：Britain faces an “acute challenge” to raise its underlying rate of economic growth as long as participation in the workforce remains weak, Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said.】

item.title: 日本央行上田称女性和外籍劳工可帮助填补劳动力缺口
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，让更多女性从事全职工作，雇用更多外国工人，有助于解决日本人口老龄化和低出生率造成的劳动力紧张问题。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said bringing more women into full-time jobs and employing more foreign workers could help address the labor squeeze created by Japan’s aging population and low birth rate.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称劳动力市场很好地抵御了近期冲击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，面对一代人中仅有一次的通胀冲击和咄咄逼人的加息，欧洲劳动力市场表现出了令人惊讶的韧性。【原文：Europe’s labor market has proved surprisingly resilient in the face of a once-in-a-generation inflation shock and aggressive interest-rate hikes, according to European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 信贷助推人工智能繁荣— 以及对泡沫的担忧
item.description: 信贷投资者正向人工智能投资投入数十亿美元，而行业高管和分析师们却在质疑这项新技术是否正在催生另一个泡沫。【原文：Credit investors are pouring billions of dollars into artificial intelligence investments, just as industry executives and analysts are raising questions about whether the new technology is inflating another bubble.】

item.title: 美国债务与 GDP 的比率达到 250% 不会推高利率：杰克逊霍尔文件
item.description: 美联储杰克逊霍尔会议上发表的一篇论文称，美国政府债务可能达到国内生产总值的 250%，而不会对利率造成上行压力。【原文：US government debt could reach 250% of gross domestic product without putting upward pressure on interest rates, according to a paper presented at the Federal Reserve’s Jackson Hole conference.】

item.title: 烧毁杰富瑞的 "庞氏骗局 "之水，每个人都能从中受益，直到它无法受益
item.description:
一家自动售货机企业曾标榜回报丰厚、超级安全，如今却成为联邦检察官和愤怒的投资者的纠缠不清的诉讼目标。【原文：

A vending-machine venture that once touted juicy, super-safe returns is now the target of federal prosecutors and a tangle of lawsuits by angry investors who say they were duped.

】

item.title: 默茨称应对德国经济困境比预期艰难
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）说，事实证明，应对国家经济挑战是一项远比他最初预计的要艰巨得多的任务。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said tackling the country’s economic challenges is proving to be a far greater undertaking than he initially anticipated.】

item.title: 美国共和党议员力推关税政策以帮助本土企业
item.description: 国会共和党人正在支持唐纳德-特朗普的关税运动，将其作为推进本州事业的一种方式，游说总统征收更多进口关税，以保护本地公司。【原文：Congressional Republicans are embracing Donald Trump’s tariff campaign as a way to advance home-state causes, lobbying the president to impose more import duties to protect local companies.】

item.title: 特朗普与美国统计局发生争执后，华尔街更加倚重私人数据
item.description: 几十年来，Philip Petursson 在 IG Wealth Management 的投资建议中一直依赖劳工统计局的数据。他说，这不是唯一的依据，但也是一个重要的参考。【原文：Philip Petursson has relied on Bureau of Labor Statistics data for decades to inform his investing recommendations at IG Wealth Management. Not solely, but as a key input, he said.】

item.title: 危机持续，澳大利亚将加快住房建设
item.description: 澳大利亚政府正计划采取一系列措施加快住宅建设，因为该国仍在努力应对全国性的住房危机。【原文：Australia’s government is planning a series of measures to speed up the construction of homes as the country continues to grapple with a national housing crisis.】

item.title: 特朗普 "解决 "的战争数量仍有争议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）希望加强自己作为全球和平缔造者的传统，最近几天他经常吹嘘自己至少结束了六场战争。对总统记录的批评者说，事实要复杂得多。【原文：Looking to bolster his legacy as a global peacemaker, Donald Trump has boasted often in recent days that he’s ended at least six wars. Critics of the president’s record say the truth is a lot more complicated.】

item.title: 布基纳法索停止盖茨基金会支持的抗疟疾项目
item.description: 布基纳法索暂停了盖茨基金会资助的一项旨在阻止非洲最大杀手之一疟疾传播的研究计划，因为该计划招致了反西方活动人士的批评。【原文：Burkina Faso suspended a Gates Foundation-funded research program aimed at stopping the spread of malaria, one of the biggest killers in Africa, after the initiative drew criticism from anti-Western activists.】

item.title: 尼日利亚的 "自助经济 "如何变得更加庞大
item.description: 汇总经济数据是一个持续的过程，依赖于有时不完整或姗姗来迟的信息，这可能导致戏剧性的修正，就像几周前发生在美国的情况一样。上个月，尼日利亚也发生了这样的变化，该国宣布其国内生产总值突然增长了 30% 以上。【原文：Assembling economic data is a continuous process, dependent on information that’s sometimes incomplete or late in arriving, which can lead to dramatic corrections as happened in the US a few weeks ago. Another such shift happened in Nigeria last month when it was announced that the nation’s gross domestic product was suddenly more than 30% bigger.】

item.title: 富士康召回更多中国员工考验苹果在印度的推进力度
item.description: 苹果公司的组装合作伙伴富士康科技集团从印度的一家工厂召回了约 300 名中国工程师，这是这家 iPhone 制造商在印度快速扩张的最新挫折。【原文：Apple Inc. assembly partner Foxconn Technology Group has recalled about 300 Chinese engineers from a factory in India, the latest setback for the iPhone maker’s push to rapidly expand in the country.】

item.title: 据说汇丰银行瑞士银行将在改革中撤出 1,000 名中东客户
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）旗下的瑞士私人银行正在终止与中东富裕客户的合作关系，其中包括许多资产超过 1 亿美元的客户，因为该银行正努力降低其认为高风险客户的风险敞口。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s Swiss private bank is ending relationships with wealthy Middle Eastern clients, including many with assets exceeding $100 million, as the bank seeks to lower its exposure to individuals it deems high-risk, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国和欧洲制造业扩张
item.description: 本周分别进行的调查显示，欧元区制造业摆脱了长达三年的低迷，而美国工厂则因需求回升而实现了自2022年以来的最大扩张。【原文：Manufacturing in the euro area emerged from a three-year downturn while factories in the US expanded by the most since 2022 as demand picked up, separate surveys showed this week.】

item.title: 雷恩称欧洲央行无需在通胀率为 2% 的情况下削减 "保险费
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，在通胀率达到 2% 的目标且经济表现略好于预期之后，欧洲央行并不急于进一步降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank is in no rush to lower interest rates further after inflation hit its 2% target and with the economy performing slightly better than thought, according to Governing Council member Olli Rehn.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行结束危机时期的里拉保护计划
item.description: 土耳其正式终止了 2021 年 12 月推出的存款工具，该工具的目的是在上一次货币危机期间支持里拉。【原文：Turkey officially ended a deposit instrument introduced in December 2021 aimed at supporting the lira during a previous currency crisis.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比称赞鲍威尔管理纷争不断的 FOMC
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）称赞杰罗姆-鲍威尔在担任美联储主席的八年任期内，美联储官员之间的分歧较少。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee credited Jerome Powell for the low level of disagreement across the range of Fed officials during his eight-year tenure as chair.】

item.title: 开发商保持谨慎，中国太阳能新增装机量进一步放缓
item.description: 7 月份，中国的太阳能装机继续放缓，因为开发商仍在谨慎等待 6 月份生效的新政策的更多细节，该政策可能会影响可再生能源的回报。【原文：China’s solar installation continued to slow in July, as developers remained cautious waiting for more details about a new policy that took effect in June and may affect renewable returns.】

item.title: 中国起草互联网平台定价新规
item.description: 国家发展和改革委员会周六发表声明称，中国监管机构已起草了新的互联网平台定价规则。【原文：China’s regulatory bodies have drafted new rules for internet platform pricing, the National Development and Reform Commission said in a statement on Saturday.】

item.title: 德国财政部长承诺改革以扭转经济衰退
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）为执政联盟的经济政策进行了辩护，并承诺在年底前推进更多改革，以帮助刺激经济增长。【原文：German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil defended the governing coalition’s economic policies and pledged to push ahead with additional reforms by the end of the year to help spur growth.】
